name: @esta-logic/helix
description: Pure functional Gleam accrual engine - compiles to WASM for Tauri pivot

scripts.build: which gleam && gleam deps download --all && gleam build || echo 'Gleam not installed - skipping helix build'
scripts.test: which gleam && gleam deps download --all && gleam test || echo 'Gleam not installed - skipping helix tests'
scripts.test:coverage: which gleam && gleam deps download --all && gleam test || echo 'Gleam not installed - skipping helix coverage'
